import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { BarChart3, MessageSquare, Brain, Users, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; interface DashboardStats { totalChats: number; totalKnowledge: number; activeUsers: number; avgResponseTime: number; } const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalChats: 0, totalKnowledge: 0, activeUsers: 1, avgResponseTime: 1.2 }); useEffect(() => { // Simulate fetching dashboard stats const fetchStats = () => { // In a real app, this would fetch from API setStats({ totalChats: Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) + 50, totalKnowledge: Math.floor(Math.random() * 20) + 10, activeUsers: Math.floor(Math.random() * 5) + 1, avgResponseTime: Math.random() * 2 + 0.5 }); }; fetchStats(); const interval = setInterval(fetchStats, 30000); // Update every 30 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const StatCard: React.FC<{ title: string; value: string | number; icon: React.ReactNode; color: string; }> = ({ title, value, icon, color }) => (

{title}

{value}

{icon}
); return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome to SateCha

Securing your privacy

{/* Vision Section */}

Our Vision

To empower individuals and organizations with the knowledge and skills to protect themselves from cyber threats.

{/* Features Section */}

Explore Our Features

{/* Dashboard Card */}

Dashboard

Browse recent incidents and scams reported for learning and awareness purposes.

{/* Cyber Quiz Card */}

Cyber Quiz

Take an interactive quiz to test how cyber-aware you really are!

{/* My Cyber Chatbot Card */}

My Cyber Chatbot

Chat with My Cyber your friendly AI assistant for cybersecurity knowledge.

{/* Cybercrime Reports Section */}

Recent Cybercrime Reports

Stay informed about the latest cyber threats and statistics in Myanmar

{/* Sample Report Card 1 */}
Banking Fraud High
2024-06-25

KBZ Mobile Banking (Individual) Unauthorized Withdrawal

A user reported that 189 lakhs was transferred from their KBZ Mobile Banking account to an unknown account without their authorization. The user was overseas and had only shared their SIM card with their spouse for receiving OTP codes when needed...

{/* Sample Report Card 2 */}
Phishing Medium
2024-06-24

Fake Government Website Scam

Multiple reports of fake government websites requesting personal information and payment for official documents. Users are advised to verify official websites through proper channels...

{/* Footer */}

Developed by NexTech Five

); }; export default Dashboard;
